title: MFW the most toxic or people who feed the most get honor 5

replies.body: And people called me retarded for saying this system is purely RNG

The system is a grind.
It's not about getting honor really, rather about how many games you play.
The more you play, the more you win, the more you progress in honor levels.

I've seen people getting Honor 3/4 after like 10 games.

I played 50, getting at least 1 honor per game and I'm still at Honor 2.
My friend who basically goes afk nearly every game because some female called him and is always toxic got honor 5 today, and i know he gets reported damn near every game too
I think your friend needs to learn the magic of letting the call go to voicemail
ya lol i carried a game no honor. Say gj team amd is friendly no honor. Play sup play well save ppl no honor. Still honor 2
